title: If I score 100 marks in the MHT CET, what colleges will I get in Pune? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are many colleges in pune but you can get lower branches like.. Sinhgad College of Engineering Vishwakarma Institute of Technology Sinhgad Academy Of Engineering Pune Vidhyarthi Griha's College of Engineering and Technology Bharati Vidyapeeth (Deemed to be University) Dr. D. Y. Patil Institute Of Technology MIT College of Engineering Though cutoffs can vary depending on various factors each year. What matters is your rank check this answer for past year analysis. I Hope This Help You….
Bad score Very low Not get good college Only some private college Not worth doing MBA From low college Bring good marks Work hard Stay focused
